header.title: Become an exhibitor
header.subtitle: 10k+ attendees, 200+ companies and 300+ partners in four cities across Europe. A great opportunity to find or change to a new job, learn from the best experts in the IT & Digital industry and to network with your peers.

benefits.text: Great opportunity to connect with more than 1000+ attendees.
It is more than a job fair, it's a branding opportunity for your brand/ company.
Find access to our community having the chance to start engaging with top notch students, young and tech professionals.
Connect and stay in touch with other companies and platforms in other fields such as the medical and health field, media, education institutions and more...
Get additional reach and visibility. The sooner you save your spot, the faster we start promoting your brand and culture within our 200K+ followers & huge community.
The event is held with the clear objective of providing equal treatment to all, regardless of color, gender, culture, etc. We strongly believe that talents are not limited to any hitches.

ctabox.title: Book your seats now before your competitor does, as there are limited stands available!

incentive.text: The quicker you are at booking your place, the better location you get of your choice. The availability of rostrums, assignment of communication/presentation apertures and workspaces of the events are limited.
This is a chance not to be missed, if you’re not there your competitors will be!

header.title: Booth Plans
header.subtitle: Let’s discuss your needs and requirements and let us make this happen together.

items.description: Includes electricity, own design, 3 partner tickets
Includes electricity, booth designed by Migrapreneur, 3 partner tickets

faq.question: What is Migra24 about?
faq.answer:
Migra24 is a student-driven, not-for-profit movement on a mission to create and help the next generation of groundbreaking entrepreneurs, originally founded to change attitudes toward entrepreneurship.

The Slush 2023 event features two days full of stage programs in addition to over 300 Side Events, mentoring, meetings, and afterparties (duh). Our speaker line-up includes successful founders, world-class investors, and other startup and tech influencers.

Migra has grown from a single event in Helsinki to a one-of-a-kind exorbitant community and series of Migra'D events organized all around the world.
